caseTitle: Muhammad Uneeb Ahmed v. Federation of Pakistan thr. its Secretary M/o Science and Technology, Islamabad & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: F.Sc and DAE holders to apply through open competition for a position in B.Sc (Engineering) - No reserved quota for DAE. Both the degrees are at par for admission into B.Sc (Engineering).
